server.name: io.github.MasonChow/source-map-parser-mcp
server.description: Parse JavaScript error stack traces back to original source code using source maps

environmentVariables.description: Context lines around error locations in source code
environmentVariables.name: SOURCE_MAP_PARSER_CONTEXT_OFFSET_LINE

environmentVariables.description: Maximum memory cache size in MB for source maps
environmentVariables.name: SOURCE_MAP_PARSER_RESOURCE_CACHE_MAX_SIZE
